blog.description:
A summer of cheesy plots, corny settings, fluffy, slow burn fics! 'Phandom Summer Fics' embraces it all!

Posting will be during the summer of 2019.

For links on mobile click here.

Run by Amethyst and Viki. For any questions message us on Tumblr or send us an email phandomsummerfics@yahoo.com

blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: Oh and another 2012 one: 2012 Dan wasn’t that problematic. I think he was just in a bad place with his mental health and was...
question: Oh and another 2012 one: 2012 Dan wasn’t that problematic. I think he was just in a bad place with his mental health and was trying to balance a whole new radio career, moving to a completely different city, and having his fanbase jump up to 1m subs (who then got way too into his business and forced him to go on the defensive). Early 20s are hard. I wasn’t always the most pleasant person then either, and I wasn’t famous at all. People just like to throw him under the bus when he calls them out.
answer: Oh, I could not agree with this more and would even take it a bit further: I don’t think 2012 had anything to do with mental health (not that you are doing this, but I have heard people use this to try to discredit him a lot). I think Dan reacted really pretty well under the circumstances. Sure he could have handled everything better, but musicians and actors have teams of people helping them to manage these things and early YouTubers didn’t have any of that. What kind of sainthood do people realistically expect from a 21 year old who (in addition to the things you mentioned) was not only being stalked and harassed himself, but was also the reason his friends and family were being stalked and harassed, who was being objectified, violated, and fetishized, and who was getting incredible amounts of backlash for trying to live his truth, which unfortunately wasn’t the same as the truth certain “fans” wanted for him. I’m all for YouTubers and celebrities being nice to their fans, but these fans didn’t deserve anything and they got much more polite responses from him than they would have from a lot of people. He was trying to have a dialogue with people and give them the benefit of the doubt, assuming they would behave reasonably, and they behaved like spoiled children throwing a tantrum because their toys got taken away. Some people are still throwing tantrums over this when they even hear the word 2012. It truly makes my blood boil. I will never understand how people can look at the behavior from others (and maybe even themselves) at the time, look at Dan’s reactions to that, and then come to the conclusion that he was the main problem.

blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: no, i agree with you, many aspects of that idea are pretty demeaning to dan, and phannies really do love that "trope" you...
body:
no, i agree with you, many aspects of that idea are pretty demeaning to dan, and phannies really do love that “trope” you described, but thats partially because there are screenshots and clips like that being shared around and because dan used to really feed into that “trope” himself, for whatever reason

comments from “How to befriend your favourite internet stars” saying that’s exactly what he did, “just remove the silly parts”, him saying that Phil “saved” him, etc and then him bringing the whole concept back in more recent years. “Stalking him until he loves you/Phil trash #1”. he uses that “trope” himself, and many phannies can’t understand that both Dan and Phil are so much more than their head canons and fanfiction and all the (usually harmful and demeaning) labels they placed on them both. they don’t see them as complex individuals or their relationship as something complex and personal, and i do wish Dan and Phil tried harder to make them understand that.

https://youtu.be/lNVFccGnRSk

https://youtu.be/BsBmYaKPgt0 (it’s a compilation)

———

All good points, anon. I think there is a difference between using stereotypes and tropes in joking ways, like Dan and Phil do and have done, and between presenting those things as the narrow definition of of a person, which the tinhatters do (and then phannies who don’t have context or the experience to understand why that’s a problem follow). On the one hand, I don’t think it should be put on Dan and Phil to change the way they act, but on the other hand there does seem to be a lack of understanding. I think it would be best if people all just took these things with a grain of salt realizing that we are lacking all the context from vague posts on now defunct websites that were made a decade ago. If people would just stop presenting headcanon as fact that would be a good start.

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: So some time back I was bored enough to go through old dnp threads on gurugossip and someone had suggested that Phil should host...
question: So some time back I was bored enough to go through old dnp threads on gurugossip and someone had suggested that Phil should host a kids’ show of some sort. And I could kinda see that working out? Not like him getting dressed up in a costume but like him announcing things or talking to kids or whatever. There’s probably no actual chance of that happening tho but. Thoughts?
answer: I feel like I’ve never even seen Dan or Phil interact with a child. Aside from the occasional meet and greet photo, or “look I held a baby” photo, the only times I can remember seeing Dan or Phil interact with a child is that one live show from years ago where they held Phil’s friends baby, or Louises vlog from last year where they met pearl. So while I’m sure they’re both good with kids, I have no actual frame of reference to go by. Though I don’t really envision Phil runningrhg a children’s game show or anything. If YouTube flops, I can see him either doing something in film, or maybe finally putting that English language degree to good use somehow.

Aside from the occasional meet and greet photo, or “look I held a baby” photo, the only times I can remember seeing Dan or Phil interact with a child is that one live show from years ago where they held Phil’s friends baby, or Louises vlog from last year where they met pearl. So while I’m sure they’re both good with kids, I have no actual frame of reference to go by. Though I don’t really envision Phil runningrhg a children’s game show or anything. If YouTube flops, I can see him either doing something in film, or maybe finally putting that English language degree to good use somehow.

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: AU (9) Masterlist
body:
part one, part two, part three, part four, part five, part six, part seven, part eight

A Picture Is Worth - yiffandquiff

Summary: Dan is a student photographer who finds comfort in taking photos. Phil is the older man who is finally confronting Dan on why he’s trespassing on his dock.

Cact us - dnpgays

Summary: Space!dan gets a new neighbour who just happens to be a cute boy with a love for plants.

Flight to Flight - shippingfangirl26

Summary: Dan Howell, aspiring Ski Jumper, meets the handsome stranger Phil at an airport, and they hit it off immediately. But what he didn’t know was that Phil was more than he seemed to be…

Here Comes The Jackpot Question In Advance - beattriceduke

Summary: The one where Dan thought Phil hated him, so he hated Phil right back.

I’m Waiting For the Day (ao3) - japhanforever

Summary: Dan has been working in the Lester’s pet store for two years now, but he has been pining after their youngest son, Phil, since possibly the beginning of time. Phil is somewhat of an enigma to everyone, and Dan wants nothing more than to get to know Phil a little better, but since Phil has never given Dan a second look, it seems impossible. That is until Phil asks Dan to accompany him to a pet expo to help expand their business. Then, a whole lot of things seem more possible. (also this will be chaptered i some how messed that up in the description)

In Bloom For You (ao3) - parentaladvisorybullshitcontent

Summary: In which Phil’s an ex vampire hunter who’s entirely too preoccupied by Dan’s dimple and his eyes and his laugh to notice the fact that he might actually be in love with a vampire (Sequel to Hanging Out With Corpses)

I Really Can’t Tell If I’m Dreaming Or Breathing - wavydanrises

Summary: Dan is an events manager at the Queen’s Garden’s, one of the city’s most renowned hotels, and he’s organizing a Christmas reception with the cute reception planner called Phil Lester.

It’s Like We’re Going Under - succubusphan

Summary: After a very rough year in their relationship, Dan is not sure if he should quit or keep trying to salvage what they had.

Let Go Of The Reins (ao3) - natigail

Summary: Dan did not want to go home to his parents’ house the summer after his first year of studying law - which he was failing at - so when a friend suggested a simple job that would keep him busy for three months and give him a place to live, he couldn’t say no. Granted, shovelling horse shit wasn’t glamorous and he was afraid of horses, but the Lester Stables had other things going for it.

Phil was newly graduated with a video editing degree and moving home to his parents’ horse stables, even if he still would not get back on the horse since what happened earlier in the year. He had a complicated relationship with horses to begin with and he had decided he was done riding. When the new stablehand help arrives, Phil finds himself going out to the stables more often despite trying to stay away.

Play Upon Me Like This Piano (ao3) - Elleberquist6

Summary: In many ways, Phil’s life is perfect: he loves his life in London, he has a wonderful brother and parents, and he has a great job as a radio DJ for BBC Radio One. There’s only one thing missing in his life… A rumor reaches an executive at the BBC about a talented local piano player named Daniel. The executive decides that Daniel would be the perfect guest on Phil’s radio show, so she sends Phil to speak with the evasive and mysterious piano player. When they finally meet, Phil starts to think that he has found the person who will make his life complete. Unfortunately, Dan has a secret that will make getting close to him difficult.

Repetition - placingglaciers

Summary: In which it is a typical Tuesday morning where Dan is coming off a graveyard shift to wash clothes at his usual local laundromat that Phil owns and they have breakfast together.

“Sir, How Old Is The Boy?” (ao3) - fourthingsandawizard

Summary: Dan and Phil take a quick break from their world tour, staying in an Airbnb that Martyn and Cornelia rented for the week from an eccentric Australian wizard. When Dan wakes up one morning as his ten-year-old self after drinking a magical tea that Phil accidentally brewed for him, they’re forced to look for a solution before their viewers—or Martyn—can find out about it.

The Boy on the Blue Moon Dreams of Sun - phanlight

Summary: dan is a theatre kid who hasn’t had his first kiss but has to kiss someone for a show. he doesn’t want his first kiss to be wasted so he tries to get it done properly beforehand & he meets phil and w/e you can take it from there!!!

The Boy with the Rose-Colored Glasses - placingglaciers

Summary: A coming-of-age story where Dan and Phil are caught up in the frenzy of peer pressure, a garage punk band, divorcing parents, and a hint of neighborhood baseball within the fine time of August 1975 in small-town America (if you don’t mind).

The Part Of You They’ll Never See (Is The Part You’ve Shown To Me) (ao3) - The_Blonde

Summary: Editing Student Phils and their Ex Art Thief boyfriends.

The Space Speeder - cringe-attack

Summary: Phil works as a ride operator for a galaxy themed roller coaster- the Space Speeder. When a cute but annoying boy won’t follow the safety rules, Phil’s boss tells him to take the boy to security.

To the moon and back - marunette

Summary: AU where Phil is an astronomer and Dan is an astronaut.

Two Strangers Drinking Champagne In An Airport - pasteldanhowells

Summary: Dan and Phil in an airport terminal drinking champagne out of plastic cups with a bunch of those airport TV screens in the background with all the flights cancelled.

Under the trees and shooting stars - wavydanrises

Summary: Dan’s parents have insisted that he comes with them on a family holiday at a hiking camp in the middle of the woods, and he isn’t too happy about that for various reasons. Until he meets the son of the owners, who works there

daily posts and updates

about dan and phil

-

i track #dailydnp if you want me

to see/reblog anything
